# phoneNumberCheckingResult(range:phoneNumber:)

**Type Method**

Creates and returns a text checking result with the specified phone number.

## Declaration

```swift
class func phoneNumberCheckingResult(range: NSRange, phoneNumber: String) -> NSTextCheckingResult
```

## Parameters

- **range**: The range of the detected result.
- **phoneNumber**: The phone number.

## Return Value

Returns an `NSTextCheckingResult` with the specified [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/range] and a [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/resultType] of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTextCheckingResult/CheckingType/phoneNumber].

## Text Checking Results for Phone Numbers

- **phoneNumber**: The phone number of a type checking result.
